metadata.Title: CVE-2013-0262 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description:
rack/file.rb (Rack::File) in Rack 1.5.x before 1.5.2 and 1.4.x before 1.4.5allows attackers to access arbitrary files outside the intended rootdirectory via a crafted PATH_INFO environment variable, probably adirectory traversal vulnerability that is remotely exploitable, aka"symlink path traversals."

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-0262` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

librack-ruby - 1.5.2-1
librack-ruby1.8 - 1.5.2-1
librack-ruby1.9.1 - 1.5.2-1
ruby-rack - 1.5.2-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ruby-rack package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.5.2-1').
